headline.print_headline: Large Funds Are Dropping Investments in Fossil Fuels
headline.main: Investment Funds Worth Trillions Are Dropping Fossil Fuel Stocks

snippet: A report said the new total, more than $5 trillion, was twice the amount measured 15 months ago....
abstract: Report by Arabella Advisors finds that investors controlling over $5 trillion in assets have committed to dropping some or all fossil fuel stocks from their portfolios; high number highlights how divestment movement that began on American college campuses in 2011 in effort to fight climate change has blossomed into worldwide effort.
